mods.abstract: 1953-04-11 broadcast of WSM's Breakfast At The Opry, part 2. Personnel include Dave Overton (announcer), Eddie Hill (host), Ernest Tubb (performer), Billy Bird (performer with the Texas Troubadours), Dickie Harris (performer with the Texas Troubadours), Ray Price (guest), and Marty Robbins (guest). Held at the Noel Hotel, Nashville, TN. Sponsored by Rock City. Names of audience members are unconfirmed.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
